page.title: 19Crowthorne Carnival
page.content: {Crowthorne Carnival}has become a bi-annual event. Local traders, clubs, schools and individuals take part in the week long festivities. The theme for 1985 was{'Headlines from History'. Broadmoor School won the youth section with 'St.George and the Dragon'.The dragon was scaly and green with red and yellow spots. Inside were lots of children holding up hoops. They said it was hot and stuffy but a lot of fun. The dragon's tail was wriggling about because it was fixed to a skate-board. After the procession there was a {fete}with plenty to watch, buy and do.There was a B.M.X.cycle display, a Wild West Show, Break dancers, the Firemen's display and a bouncy castle. During the week there were various sports competitions, a pram race, Flower Festival and Music Festival.
